R.SpellName: R - The Call of the Pack

Change.After: NEW EFFECT: Gains 7.5 Lavender stacks per round.

Change.Attribute: Assassin Out-of-Combat Window to Reset Passive:
Assassin Bonus Cast and Emerge range:

Change.After: Gain gold based on damage dealt to enemy champions, equal to a random amount between 2% and 8% of the damage, biased towards 8%.
Firebrand,Heavy Hitter, Light 'em Up, and Angel of Retribution now deal 50% damage during W
On-unit-kill bonus health doubled. (On champion takedown bonus health unchanged)

Change.Attribute: Bonus Magic Damage on Marked Target:

Change.Before: 55/70/85/100/115 (+3% (+1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Change.After: 55/70/85/100/115 (+5% (+1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

Change.Before: 75/100/125/150/175 (+4% (+2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
Change.After: 75/100/125/150/175 (+7% (+2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
NEW EFFECT: Gains 1 Feast stack per round after learning the ability.
Passively gains 1 Silver Serpent Silver Serpent per second.
NEW EFFECT: Now grants gold and Silver Serpents Silver Serpents equal to 7% of damage dealt to champions.
Gains 187.5 Silver Serpents Silver Serpents per round.
First package spawn time reduced to 5:00.
Package now spawns in the battlefield rather than at the spawn.
NEW EFFECT: Spawns the package every round starting at level 6.
Gains 12.5 Phenomenal Evil stacks per round.
Gains 5 Soul Fragment stacks per round.

Change.Attribute: Cooldown Reduction on Spell Cast or Hit Taken:
Base Maximum HP Damage per Second:

Change.After: NEW EFFECT: Increases the GUARDIAN item limit from 1 to 2.
Number of Crystal Spires spawned on the battlefield changed to five.
One in each brush (with the central one being neutral).
One in each team's base (below each inhibitor).

Change.Attribute: H-28Q Apex Turret beam base damage:
Human Form Minimum Damage AP Ratio:

Change.After: Deaths required for a grave changed to 5 at all levels.
Now spawns a grave at a random location within 600 units every 8 seconds.
Bonus resistances on-kill changed to 0.5. Number of enemy kills needed to reach the maximum amount changed to 60.
Malzahar deals 60% AoE damage to Minions

Shyvana gains 1 bonus armor, 1 bonus magic resistance, and 0.05 bonus Fury regeneration whenever a siege or a canon minion dies within 1400 units range of her, or when she is healed by a health relic's area of effect on the enemy's side of the map. She will not gain bonuses if she is dead, even if in range.
Shyvana gains 2 bonus armor, 2 bonus magic resistance and 0.05 bonus Fury regeneration whenever she or her allies kill nearby epic monsters, jungle monsters, and Rift Scuttler.
Gain 5 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance per round.

Change.Attribute: Adoration stacks per kill or Axe catch:
Adoration stacks per Axe catch from an enemy:

Change.Before: 25% (+2% of 100 bonus AD) of the damage dealt to enemies
Change.After: 35% (+3% of 100 bonus AD) of the damage dealt to enemies

Change.Attribute: Evolved Bonus Cooldown Refund on Isolated Target:

Change.Before: 10-95 (based on level) (+ 116% - 150% (based on level) AD) physical damage
Change.After: 11.5-109.25 (based on level) (+ 118.4% - 157.5% (based on level) AD) physical damage
Gains 10 Splinters of Wrath per round.
NEW EFFECT: Gains 31.25 Stardust stacks per round.

Now drops Spell Shards for the following: Blade Waltz, Castle , Defensive Maneuvers, Die Another Day, Evocation, Feel the Burn, Flee, Frozen Foundations, Now You See Me, Vanish, Warmup Routine, and Zhonya's Epiphany.
Bloblets are damaged by the Ring of Fire.
During the events of Bardle Royale, URF Deathmatch, and Prize Fight, allied champions that are revived will respawn at the location of their death and with 30% maximum health.
NEW EFFECT: Scoundrel takedown gold is now also granted to his ally.
Revive now spawns ally in the battlefield rather than at the spawn.
Gains 1 Mark of the Kindred stack per round.

Change.Before: 25/30/35/40/45 (+20% Bonus AD) (+20% AP) (+1.5% (+1% per mark mark) target's current HP)
Change.After: 10/15/20/25/30 (+10% Bonus AD) (+20% AP) (+1% (+0.5% per mark mark) target's current HP).

Change.Before: 80-160 (+80% bonus AD) (+5% missing HP) (+0.5% missing HP per mark)
Change.After: 80-160 (+80% bonus AD) (+2% missing HP) (+0.5% missing HP per mark)
Targeting a Health Relic on Howling Abyss icon Howling Abyss grants the RIVER Element.
Azir will start the game with one point already ranked in Arise!, allowing him to allocate the other two to his other abilities.
Each collected soul counts as 2 instead of 1.

P.SpellName: P - Prophet of an Elder God

Change.After: Passive is disabled in Nexus Blitz.
Chime spawn rate changed to every 30 seconds instead of 50 seconds (initial spawn unchanged).
Increased chime spawn rate. First spawn at 30 seconds, spawns 2 new ones every 20 seconds.
Increased Chime spawn rate during combat.
Forging an item puts Living Forge on a 120-second cooldown.
Upon receiving the automatic upgrade, both his and his ally's Mythic items are upgraded to their Masterwork variants.
Ornn can now only get stat amplifications for upgrading a maximum of 2 mythics per game. If Ornn or his teammate acquires the Mythical Augment, this cap will rise by 5.
Enemy ultimate cooldown is refreshed each round.

Base damage stored near multiple enemies:

Change.After: Executing an enemy champion now grants 600 Gold 600 to the champion on the team who did not kill them.
Damage against Scuttle Racer, loot Teemoa and loot Veigar is now based off the champion with the most bonus health on the enemy team.
Zeri will start the game with one point already ranked in Burst Fire!, allowing her to allocate the other two to her other abilities.
